item.title: The gentle art of giving feedback!
item.description: What is feedback and why is important? Feedback, by definition, is information given to someone about their performance or behavior to help them to improve and thrive in the future. Positive feedback vs Negative feedback Commonly we use the terms positive feedback or negative feedback, I don’t love those terms, good feedback can’t be negative, and sometimes the “positive” feedback might not be that positive. I prefer to split them by the objective, so we have:
